title: 111_hr4389
content: Green Energy Paper Manufacturing Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow: (1) a general business tax credit, up to $25 million in a taxable year, for the production of energy from biomass fuels for a pulp, paper, or paperboard manufacturing facility located in the United States. And (2) advance payments of credit amounts for liquid biomass used as a fuel to produce steam or energy at any such facility.
